Package views

package views
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChampionCard
    A concrete implementation of the purchasable card for displaying a champion as a card.
    ChampionMatchCard
    A card to represent a champion that is currently on the grid in a live match.
    ChampionSetupView
    View which allows the user to choose four champions to take part in the match
    CutsceneView
    A panel to display a cutscene.
    EndingView
     
    HeaderPanel
    A panel containing a white label in header font and an optional gray background for readability.
    InfoPanel
     
    LevelUpView
    Static class which handles showing the level up dialogue for a champion and communicating the chosen stat to level up to the game manager
    MatchView
    A panel to display the currently playing live match.
    PurchasableCard
    An abstract class for displaying a purchasable in the form of a panel.
    SetupView
    View which shows the setup view to the player
    ShopView
    A panel that display the shop.
    StadiumView
    A panel to display the stadium.
    StatLabel
    A stat label is a panel that shows a certain stat in a pre-formatted way.
    TabbedView
    A panel that contains a tabbed pane for navigating between the game's team, shop, and stadium views.
    TeamView
     
    WeaponCard
     
    WeaponSetupView
    Class which handles the weapon setup view, which is where the player selects which of their weapons are given to each champion.
